page.title: 01LIFE IN WALPOLE
page.content: FARMING _______ In Walpole it is mostly ARABLE farming e.g. potatoes,sugar beet and corn. There are some fruit farms and in summer and at potato time we have diddicois who bring their caravans down for the picking seasons.The main fruits are strawberries and apples.The farms are not large.Many farmers will have 100 acres or less of their own land. PARISH COUNCILS _______________ There are 3 village centres at Walpole St. Peter,Walpole St. Andrew and Walpole Marsh.These belong to two parish councils but very soon they will amalgamete.The parish councils meet four times a year in the schools.
